channel.title: Need help getting my server online
channel.description:
Hey i have a server and client, portfowarded port '25' checked and its open. i have a no-ip duc set up for it, i can login to it, all fine.
How would i go about getting it online? All help appreciated very much.
Thankyou, Jake.

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

pray4urlife:

Lol no problem we all have to learn some how. Ok mainly look in you client its always going to be client sided. So look for client.java then type in 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 you can also type in Server =. Then also look in Gui.java and do the same.

Lmao this is for you to connect which you already can, change the local host 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 which ever you put in the client files client.java or gui.java change it to the no-ip you made then compile it & make it a winrar file upload it!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

Ok, so search for 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 (try both) then once you find those change them to your ip that you made from no-ip. Also try typing server =. Gl if you need any more help let me know.

Read full topic

-I have portfowarded, no-ip but my server/client files are ip 0.0.0.0, what do i need to do with these ports, no-ip and that in the files for it to be set up?
Coding.

Thanks, Jake
